author: Daniel Greene
description:
Another Fantasy News! FREE TOYS OR GIFT CARDS FOR TOYS! Everyone who signs up to my giveaway with @bellesaco wins something! https://www.shopbboutique.co/vibe/danielgreene-yt2

*The Wheel of Time rights shift back, Sanderson teases the Ghostbloods in Mistborn, Anthropic is forced to pay, and Arcane takes home a huge win. Plus: House of the Dragon filming news, Howl’s Moving Castle returns to theaters, a new LEGO Death Star, Life is Strange gets a series, and much more in this week’s Fantasy News!*
